effect.shortEffect: Has a 30% chance of poisoning attacking Pokémon on contact.
effect.full: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user has a 30% chance of being poisoned.

description.diamond-pearl: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.
description.platinum: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the foe.
